name: Infinifort
description:
Infinifort is a top-down roguelite where you battle through a fort of unended enemies. Overtime collect upgrades for your character, and see how long you can last in the infinite fort!

Keep in mind this is a prototype. Due to the current state of the developers, we may not be continuing development of this project.

Game Design and Programming by Josh Hirshfield

Art all created by Sam Berkowitz

Music by Austin Cappetta
